children.name: helpYou
children.text: Actually, I might be able to help you. I heard something about a feud?

children.name: nerve
children.response: It's that Ike. He stole my Diamond Pickaxe! It's one of my most prized possessions, and he just STOLE it from me.

children.name: offer
children.text: Would you like me to get it back?
children.response: Would I! But it's pointless. Think I haven't tried?

children.name: offer2
children.text: Well, I can give it a shot. What do you have to lose?

entries.name: accepted
entries.text: You dealt with that Ike yet?!
